ack.p: The authors would like to thank the following regional coordinators for providing access to the influenza data: Astrid Louise LÃ¸vlie and Olav Hungnes from the Norwegian Institute of Public Health; Tyra Grove Krause and Michael Galle from the Statens Serum Institut in Denmark; and AnnaSara Carnahan from the Public Health Agency of Sweden. The authors would also like to acknowledge the Research and Policy for Infectious Disease Dynamics (RAPIDD) program of the Science and Technology Directorate, Department of Homeland Security and the NIH Fogarty International Center for facilitating early discussions on this study and on influenza diffusion more generally.
